message: Bob, I'm offering you the product for $950,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think that's the highest I can go. What do you think?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but $850,000 is still quite a bit lower than what I initially offered.  I'm willing to compromise, but I can't go below $900,000.  This price is still a great deal for you, considering the value you'll get from the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'll offer $875,000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
